citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:12 pm on
11/7/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone numbers on
file. The inspector spoke to a family member who stated no one was available today for an inspection. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:12 pm on 
11/7/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone numbers on 
file. The inspector spoke to a family member who stated no one was available today for an inspection. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
